link_desc:
Powershell script that can be used to monitoring StarWind Virtual SAN. Zabbix's Low-level Discovery (LLD) protocol are supported.

Can be obtained perfomance data (IOPs, Bandwith, CPU/RAM usage) and moreover - defragmentation percent, deduplication ratio and real size of LSFS disks for example

Note script can be used with Zabbix 2.0, but template provided for Zabbix 2.4 only.

Help to get or calculation (with sum/count/avg/min/max function) metric's values of:

  • StarWind SAN Server;
  • Settings and perfomance data of iSCSI target;
  • Settings and perfomance data of StarWind Device;
  • Network interface of iSCSI portal.
author: sadman
